title: Centre for Research on Socio-Cultural Change (CRESC)
abstractText: This research centre will analyse socio-cultural change. It is the first major research centre in Britain to develop a broad, empirically focused account of cultural change and its economic, social and political implications. CRESC will bring together the theoretical and methodological expertise of the University of Manchester and Open University staff in disciplines as diverse as accounting and finance, business, census and survey statistics, geography, history, social anthropology, and sociology.
